rev.desc.rev.desc: delete panel datatoproto
DEFECT ID:54057 - When an Incident is re-opened the Notification record "IM Reopen" is not called, but "IM Update" is called instead.
Changed the expression:
if ((status in $L.old="resolved" or (status in $L.old)#"close") and status in $L.new="updated") then ($L.action="reopen") in the inform panel of trigger.probsummary.post.edit RAD application
to:
if ((status in $L.old="resolved" or (status in $L.old)#"close") and status in $L.new="reopened") then ($L.action="reopen").
After re-opening an Incident, the status is set to "reopened" and not "updated". Since the original code did not check for "reopened" status, the correct Notification was not called.
Removed call to obsolete function syscurrentsite
CP SCR24005
added a couple of statements to the inform panel to take care of the 'reopen' and 'resovled' status
Panel inform
Changed if ((status in $L.new)#"alert" or status in $L.new~="DEADLINE ALERT" and status in $L.old~="DEADLINE ALERT") then ($L.action="alert")
to
if ((status in $L.new)#"alert" or status in $L.new="DEADLINE ALERT" and status in $L.old~="DEADLINE ALERT") then ($L.action="alert")
On the get.sm.env panel, replaced "service management" with "service desk".
Removed call to sla.problem.close as clocks are no longer used.
Now passes save copy of incident to the apm.action.msg application.
Modified the inform panel so it won't send the alert notification if the ticket is already in DEADLINE ALERT status.
devtx BUG11932: reversed changes made by SCR27514 (see revision history entry below.)
Modified so that a linker only gets written when a ticket from another site gets closed:
* changed decide.abort exit from check.2nd.distribute to check.close
* changed cycle.active, cycle.inactive and decide.cycle exit from check.2nd.distribute to check.distribute
Will always check for dependencies.
Modified so that when a ticket from another site was closed, it will check the dependencies on this site and close related records if necessary.
Added paging.
Edited for new engine functionality.
Call secondary distribute if the currentsite and the homesite are the same.
Added call to apm.secondary.distribute

descript.descript: delete panel datatoproto
DEFECT ID:54057 - When an Incident is re-opened the Notification record "IM Reopen" is not called, but "IM Update" is called instead.
Changed the expression:
if ((status in $L.old="resolved" or (status in $L.old)#"close") and status in $L.new="updated") then ($L.action="reopen") in the inform panel of trigger.probsummary.post.edit RAD application
to:
if ((status in $L.old="resolved" or (status in $L.old)#"close") and status in $L.new="reopened") then ($L.action="reopen").
After re-opening an Incident, the status is set to "reopened" and not "updated". Since the original code did not check for "reopened" status, the correct Notification was not called.
Removed call to obsolete function syscurrentsite
CP SCR24005
added a couple of statements to the inform panel to take care of the 'reopen' and 'resovled' status
Panel inform
Changed if ((status in $L.new)#"alert" or status in $L.new~="DEADLINE ALERT" and status in $L.old~="DEADLINE ALERT") then ($L.action="alert")
to
if ((status in $L.new)#"alert" or status in $L.new="DEADLINE ALERT" and status in $L.old~="DEADLINE ALERT") then ($L.action="alert")
On the get.sm.env panel, replaced "service management" with "service desk".
Removed call to sla.problem.close as clocks are no longer used.
Now passes save copy of incident to the apm.action.msg application.
Modified the inform panel so it won't send the alert notification if the ticket is already in DEADLINE ALERT status.
devtx BUG11932: reversed changes made by SCR27514 (see revision history entry below.)
Modified so that a linker only gets written when a ticket from another site gets closed:
* changed decide.abort exit from check.2nd.distribute to check.close
* changed cycle.active, cycle.inactive and decide.cycle exit from check.2nd.distribute to check.distribute
Will always check for dependencies.
Modified so that when a ticket from another site was closed, it will check the dependencies on this site and close related records if necessary.
Added paging.
Edited for new engine functionality.
Call secondary distribute if the currentsite and the homesite are the same.
Added call to apm.secondary.distribute
